CodeList.Name: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale Questionnaire Test Code

Description.TranslatedText: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale test code.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale - Mentation, behavior and mood: Intellectual impairment.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: UPDRS - Motor Examination: Hand Pronate/Supinate, Left

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: UPDRS - Motor Examination: Leg Agility, Right

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: UPDRS - Motor Examination: Leg Agility, Left

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale - Motor examination: Arising from chair (Patient attempts to rise from a straightbacked chair, with arms folded across chest.).
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: UPDRS - Motor Examination: Arising from Chair

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale - Motor examination: Posture.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: UPDRS - Motor Examination: Posture

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale - Motor examination: Gait.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: UPDRS - Motor Examination: Gait

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale - Motor examination: Postural stability (Response to sudden, strong posterior displacement produced by pull on shoulders while patient erect with eyes open and feet slightly apart. Patient is prepared.).
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: UPDRS - Motor Examination: Postural Stability

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale - Motor examination: Body bradykinesia and hypokinesia (Combining slowness, hesitancy, decreased arm swing, small amplitude, and poverty of movement in general.).
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: UPDRS - Motor Examination: Body Bradykinesia and Hypokinesia

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale - Complications of therapy (in the past week): Dyskinesias, Duration: What proportion of the waking day are dyskinesias present? (Historical information.).
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: UPDRS - Complications of Therapy: Dyskinesias - Duration

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale - Complications of therapy (in the past week): Dyskinesias, Disability: How disabling are the dyskinesias? (Historical information; may be modified by office examination.).
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: UPDRS - Complications of Therapy: Dyskinesias - Disability

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale - Complications of therapy (in the past week): Dyskinesias, Painful dyskinesias: How painful are the dyskinesias?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: UPDRS - Complications of Therapy: Dyskinesias - Painful Dyskinesias

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale - Complications of therapy (in the past week): Dyskinesias, Presence of early morning dystonia (Historical information.).
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: UPDRS - Complications of Therapy: Dyskinesias - Presence of Early Morning Dystonia

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale - Complications of therapy (in the past week): Clinical fluctuations, Are 'off' periods predictable?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: UPDRS - Complications of Therapy: Clinical Fluctuations - Off Periods Predictable

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale - Complications of therapy (in the past week): Clinical fluctuations, Are 'off' periods unpredictable?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: UPDRS - Complications of Therapy: Clinical Fluctuations - Off Periods Unpredictable

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale - Complications of therapy (in the past week): Clinical fluctuations, Do 'off' periods come on suddenly, within a few seconds?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: UPDRS - Complications of Therapy: Clinical Fluctuations - Off Periods Sudden

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale - Complications of therapy (in the past week): Clinical fluctuations, What proportion of the waking day is the patient 'off' on average?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: UPDRS - Complications of Therapy: Clinical Fluctuations - Average Off Periods Per Day

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale - Complications of therapy (in the past week): Other complications, Does the patient have anorexia, nausea, or vomiting?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: UPDRS - Complications of Therapy: Other Complications - Anorexia, Nausea, or Vomiting

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale - Complications of therapy (in the past week): Other complications, Any sleep disturbances, such as insomnia or hypersomnolence?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: UPDRS - Complications of Therapy: Other Complications - Sleep Disturbances

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale - Complications of therapy (in the past week): Other complications, Does the patient have symptomatic orthostasis? (Record the patient's blood pressure, height and weight on the scoring form).
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: UPDRS - Complications of Therapy: Other Complications - Symptomatic Orthostasis

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale - Blood pressure: Seated.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: UPDRS - Symptomatic Orthostasis: Blood Pressure, Seated

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale - Blood pressure: Supine.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: UPDRS - Symptomatic Orthostasis: Blood Pressure, Supine

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale - Blood pressure: Standing.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: UPDRS - Symptomatic Orthostasis: Blood Pressure, Standing

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale - Weight.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: UPDRS - Symptomatic Orthostasis: Weight

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale - Pulse: Seated.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: UPDRS - Symptomatic Orthostasis: Pulse, Seated

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale - Pulse: Standing.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: UPDRS - Symptomatic Orthostasis: Pulse, Standing

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale - Modified Hoehn and Yahr Staging.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: UPDRS - Modified Hoehn and Yahr Staging

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale - Schwab and England % ADL Score (PD).
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: UPDRS - Schwab and England % ADL Score (PD)

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale - Schwab and England % ADL (with dyskinesia).
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: UPDRS - Schwab and England % ADL (With Dyskinesia)

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale - Mentation, behavior and mood sub-total.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: UPDRS - Mentation, Behavior and Mood Sub-total

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: UPDRS - Activities of Daily Living Sub-total

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: UPDRS - Motor Examination Sub-total

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale - UPDRS total.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: UPDRS - UPDRS Total
